page.title: 09LOCAL LEGENDS
page.content: There are many legends about the area around Beechwood Park School.One is that a monk was foully murdered in his sleep in an upstairs bedroom and he now haunts the school.Many of the present place names are believed to be corruptions of eerie names.Two examples of this are Dedmansey Wood which was spelt as Deadmansea Wood,and it is thought that this was perhaps a place where the spirits of dead men were seen. Babies Wood is said to be so called because of the discovery of babies buried in the wood. Other creepy names in the area include Friendless Wood and Priors Spring.
